content.p: We are committed to supporting the career development of our post doctoral research staff. This support is available whether you intend to continue in an academic career or are considering career options outside academia. This website is currently under development and new content will be added during 2024-25. Watch this space. Our specialist advisers offer appointments and workshops Highlighting five key resources for your career development telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
